Title: Relates to the definition of research tobacco products
Summary: Relates to the definition of research tobacco products and requires colleges, universities and hospitals that receive such products to file an information return regarding such products.
LawCode: Amd §§470 & 474, Tax L (as proposed in S.5300 & A.7351); amd §11-1301, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the definition of a research tobacco product
